mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal (seq_protector, seq_doctor, animal_name, animal_type, animal_size, animal_weight, animal_age, animal_gender, animal_important_symptom, animal_join_date, animal_picture, animal_video, animal_update_date) VALUES (1, 1, #{animalName}, #{animalType}, #{animalSize}, #{animalWeight}, #{animalAge}, #{animalGender}, #{animalImportantSymptom}, now(), 'xxx.xxx', 'xxx.xxx', now() );
